author: Dan Lamothe
title: Trump issues order to bring former troops back to active duty to assist in coronavirus response - The Washington Post
description: Trump issues order to bring former troops back to active duty to assist in coronavirus response The Washington Post Trump authorizes DoD, DHS to call up reservists to fight virus POLITICO Trump Authorizes Mobilization of Ready Reserve to Assist in Coronavirus…
content:
Hoffman, who could not be reached for comment early Saturday, said that decisions about which people may be activated are still being reviewed. The statement did not address whether anyone will be involuntarily recalled.
